TypeSignature.Value: public class ObjectQuery<T> : System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T>, System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable<T>, System.Linq.IQueryable<T>

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectQuery`1<T> extends System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable, class System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable`1<!T>, class System.Linq.IQueryable, class System.Linq.IQueryable`1<!T>
Public Class ObjectQuery(Of T) Inherits ObjectQuery Implements IEnumerable(Of T), IOrderedQueryable(Of T), IQueryable(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class ObjectQuery : System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Linq::IOrderedQueryable<T>, System::Linq::IQueryable<T>

span.span: The entity type of the query.

summary.span: 表示在指定的物件內容中針對概念模型的具類型查詢。

span.span: Represents a typed query against a conceptual model in a given object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型類別 (Class) 表示傳回零個或多個特定型別物件之集合的查詢。The generic class represents a query that returns a collection of zero or more objects of a specific type. 您必須先定義 ，然後才能執行物件查詢。The must be defined before an object query can be executed. 此內容提供了撰寫及執行查詢所需的連接和中繼資料 (Metadata) 資訊。This context provides the connection and metadata information that is required to compose and execute the query. 以下情況下會執行物件查詢：An object query is executed in the following scenarios: - 當它有作用時，例如在 `foreach` (C#) 或 `For Each` (Visual Basic) 列舉型別期間。When it is acted upon, such as during a `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) enumeration. - 指派它來填滿 集合時。When it is assigned to fill a collection. - 明確呼叫 方法時。When the method is explicitly called. 您可以使用 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 陳述式 (Statement) 或 LINQ 查詢來建立查詢本身，也可以使用此類別所包含的查詢產生器方法，以累加方式建置 (Build) 此查詢。The query itself can be created by using an [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statement or a LINQ query, or it can be incrementally built by using the query builder methods included in the class. 在每種情況下，結果都是新的 執行個體，而且在您明確執行或列舉此執行個體時，它就會將查詢傳送至資料來源以便執行並且傳回結果。In every case, the result is a new instance that, when explicitly executed or enumerated over, will send the query to the data source for execution and return the results. 雖然 通常是實體 (Entity) 類型，但是它也可以是 型別 (匿名型別的投影) 或基本型別 (Primitive Type) (例如整數或字串)。An is frequently of an entity type, but it can also be of type, for projections to an anonymous type, or of a primitive type, such as an integer or string. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例將示範如何建構 類別的執行個體。The example shows how to construct an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可初始化，好讓它代表單一純量結果，而不是純量結果的集合。An can be initialized in such a way that it represents a single scalar result and not a collection of scalar results. 某些擴充方法必須將集合結果當做輸入。Some extension methods require collection results as input. 在此情況下，當呼叫其中一個方法時會擲回 。In this case, an is thrown when one of these methods is called. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). 當您的應用程式產生 Entity SQL 查詢，在執行階段時，您應該注意的資料來源的任何命令長度限制。When your application generates Entity SQL queries at runtime, you should be aware of any command length limitations of the data source. Entity SQL 不會強制執行查詢命令文字的長度限制。Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries.

Entity SQL 不會強制執行查詢命令文字的長度限制。Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例將示範如何建構 類別的執行個體。The example shows how to construct an instance of the class. Entity SQL 不會強制執行查詢命令文字的長度限制。Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries. ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 是使用指定的查詢、 和 初始化的。The is initialized with the specified query, , and . summary.span: 將查詢限制為唯一的結果。

span.span: Limits the query to unique results.

returns.span: 新的 執行個體，它就相當於套用了 [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) 的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此查詢產生器方法會傳回相當於與原始查詢的執行個體[SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md)套用。This query builder method returns an instance that is equivalent to the original query with [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) applied. `DISTINCT`無法將運算子套用至包含非可比較資料行的對應資料來源 （例如 ntext) 中的物件。The `DISTINCT` operator cannot be applied to an object that includes a mapping to a non-comparable column in the data source (such as ntext). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會使用 方法來建立新的 物件。The example uses method to create a new object. 然後，它會針對新的 物件呼叫 ，以便取得這個查詢的唯一結果。Then it calls on the new object to get the unique results of this query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_distinct_unionall)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_distinct_unionall)]

Public Function Except (query As ObjectQuery(Of T)) As ObjectQuery(Of T)
public: System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery<T> ^ Except(System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery<T> ^ query);

param.name: query
param.span: ，它代表要從查詢中排除的結果。

span.span: An that represents the results to exclude from the query.

summary.span: 根據另一個物件查詢的結果，透過排除結果限制查詢結果。

span.span: Limits the query results by excluding results based on the results of another object query.

returns.span: 新的 執行個體，其相當於根據指定的 套用了 [EXCEPT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/except-entity-sql.md) 的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [EXCEPT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/except-entity-sql.md) applied based on the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`query`，定義結果，以排除必須是相同的型別或相容的型別。The supplied `query` that defines results to exclude must be of the same type or of a type that is compatible with the . 定義的參數提供的`query`會與參數中所定義的合併執行個體。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 參數在結合的 中必須是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 結合的集合中不能有兩個參數同名。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 結果查詢會從在上面呼叫 的 執行個體繼承連接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which was called. ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會使用 方法來建立新的 物件，然後逐一查看新查詢的結果。The example uses method to create a new object and then iterates through the result of the new query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Except](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_except)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Except](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_except)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件查詢的預設合併選項是 。The default merge option for object queries is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會從 方法傳回 。The example returns an from method. 然後，它會取得列舉值並且逐一查看查詢結果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最後，它會釋放列舉值和 物件。At the end it releases the enumerator and the object. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryResult](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#queryresult)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryResult](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#queryresult)]

span.span: Groups the query results by the specified criteria.

returns.span: 屬於類型 的新 執行個體，它就相當於套用了 [GROUP BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/group-by-entity-sql.md) 的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of type that is equivalent to the original instance with [GROUP BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/group-by-entity-sql.md) applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於所指定之投影`projection`參數。 applies the projection specified by the `projection` parameter. 這表示， 方法所傳回的 一律屬於 型別。This means that the returned by the method is always of type . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 這個範例會建立新的 物件，其中包含依據產品名稱分組現有查詢的結果。This example creates a new object that contains the results of the existing query grouped by product name. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_groupby)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_groupby)] 這個範例會傳回一組巢狀的資料記錄包含`Contact.LastName`資料行分組，並依字母順序排序的第一個字母`Contact.LastName`。This example returns a set of nested data records that contain the `Contact.LastName` column, grouped and sorted alphabetically by the first letter of `Contact.LastName`. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#projection_groupby)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#projection_groupby)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery<T> Include (string path);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery`1<!T> Include(string path) cil managed
Public Function Include (path As String) As ObjectQuery(Of T)
public: System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery<T> ^ Include(System::String ^ path);

param.name: path
param.span: 要在查詢結果中傳回之相關物件的點分隔清單。

span.span: Dot-separated list of related objects to return in the query results.

summary.span: 指定要包含在查詢結果中的相關物件。

span.span: Specifies the related objects to include in the query results.

returns.span: 含有已定義之查詢路徑的新 。

span.span: A new with the defined query path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查詢路徑可以搭配 Entity SQL 和 LINQ 查詢使用。Query paths can be used with Entity SQL and LINQ queries. 路徑是全部包含的。Paths are all-inclusive. 比方說，如果包含呼叫指出`Include("Orders.OrderLines")`，不僅會`OrderLines`但也會包含在內， `Orders`。For example, if an include call indicates `Include("Orders.OrderLines")`, not only will `OrderLines` be included, but also `Orders`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). 當您呼叫 方法時，此查詢路徑只適用於 的傳回執行個體。When you call the method, the query path is only valid on the returned instance of the . 其他 執行個體和物件內容本身則不會受到影響。Other instances of and the object context itself are not affected. 由於 方法會傳回查詢物件，因此您可以針對 多次呼叫這個方法來指定查詢的多個路徑，如下列範例所示：Because the method returns the query object, you can call this method multiple times on an to specify multiple paths for the query, as in the following example: [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#SpanOnlyWithMultiplePaths](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#spanonlywithmultiplepaths)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#SpanOnlyWithMultiplePaths](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#spanonlywithmultiplepaths)] ## Examples [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithSpan](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#querywithspan)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithSpan](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#querywithspan)]

span.span: is .
is .

span.span: An that represents the results to include in the query.

summary.span: 透過僅包含存在另一個物件查詢中的結果，限制查詢結果。

span.span: Limits the query results by including only the results that exist in another object query.

returns.span: 新的 執行個體，它就相當於根據指定的 套用了 [INTERSECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/intersect-entity-sql.md) 的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [INTERSECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/intersect-entity-sql.md) applied based on the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`query`，定義結果以包含必須是相同的型別或相容的型別。The supplied `query` that defines results to include must be of the same type or of a type that is compatible with the . 定義的參數提供的`query`會與參數中所定義的合併執行個體。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 參數在結合的 中必須是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 結合的集合中不能有兩個參數同名。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 結果查詢會從在上面呼叫 方法的 執行個體繼承連接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which the method was called. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 這個範例會建立新的 物件，其中包含其他兩個查詢的結果。This example creates a new object that contains the results of two other queries. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Intersect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_intersect)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Intersect](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_intersect)]

span.span: The parameter is or is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Name { get; set; }
.property instance string Name
Public Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個物件查詢的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of this object query.
A value that is the name of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構查詢產生器方法時，物件查詢的名稱會依據名稱識別序列 (Sequence) 中的目前物件查詢。The name of the object query identifies the current object query in the sequence by name when constructing query builder methods. 根據預設，查詢名稱是`it`。By default, the query name is `it`. 在 方法內部的聯結 (Join) 中或 方法中參考目前序列時，這可能會很有用。This can be useful when referring to the current sequence in joins inside the method or in the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 當您設定 的 屬性時，該值會變成後續方法中的別名 (Alias)。When you set the property of an , that value becomes the alias in successive methods. 屬性的值必須以字母為開頭，而且可以包含字母、數字和底線。The value of the property must start with a letter and can contain letters, digits, and underscores. ## Examples 這個範例會將第一個 的名稱設定為 "product"，然後在後續 方法中使用此別名。This example sets the name of the first to "product" and then uses this alias in the successive method. 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithAliasNamed](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#querywithaliasnamed)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithAliasNamed](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#querywithaliasnamed)]

exception.span: 設定時所指定的值無效。

span.span: The value specified on set is not valid.

span.span: Limits the query to only results of a specific type.

returns.span: 新的 執行個體，它就相當於套用了 [OFTYPE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/oftype-entity-sql.md) 的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [OFTYPE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/oftype-entity-sql.md) applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用來依據特定實體或複雜類型，篩選查詢結果。 is used to filter query results by a specific entity or complex type. 這可支援具有物件繼承的概念模型。This supports a conceptual model with object inheritance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實體資料模型： 繼承](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/entity-data-model-inheritance.md)。For more information, see [Entity Data Model: Inheritance](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/entity-data-model-inheritance.md). 方法只會套用到之實體類型或 EDM 中所定義的複雜型別。The method can only be applied to an of an entity type or complex type that is defined in the EDM.

span.span: The type specified is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法確保結果在巢狀查詢中的排序。The ordering of results in a nested query cannot be guaranteed. 應該一律是序列中的最終查詢產生器方法。 should always be the final query builder method in the sequence. ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會建立新物件，其中包含現有查詢排序依據的結果`ProductID`。The example creates a new object that contains the results of the existing query order by `ProductID`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於所指定之投影`projection`參數。 applies the projection specified by the `projection` parameter. 方法所傳回的 一律屬於 資料列型別。The returned by the method is always a row type of . 您可以使用 方法來傳回屬於簡單型別、實體類型或複雜類型的值。Use the method to return values that are simple types, entity types, or complex types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[LINQ to Entities](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/linq-to-entities.md)。For more information, see [LINQ to Entities](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/linq-to-entities.md). 當投影包含導覽屬性時，查詢結果就會包含巢狀 物件的集合。When a navigation property is included in the projection, the query results include a collection of nested objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 巡覽關聯性使用導覽屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1d71c7d-16a7-4b46-96ac-690176bd5057)。For more information, see [How to: Navigate Relationships Using Navigation Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1d71c7d-16a7-4b46-96ac-690176bd5057). ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會建立新其結果是包含的資料記錄`ProductID`此查詢的結果的欄位。The example creates a new whose results are data records that contain the `ProductID` fields of the results of this query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Select](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_select)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Select](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_select)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法無法在 方法之後使用。The method cannot be used after the method. 當您使用之後，其功能類似[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)子句的陳述式。When you use after , it functions like the [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) statement of an clause. ## Examples 這個範例會取得五個`Product`物件，在跳過在查詢結果中，依排序的前三個後`Product.ListPrice`。This example gets five `Product` objects after skipping the first three in the query result, sorted by `Product.ListPrice`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非查詢已排序，否則 不具決定性。 is nondeterministic unless the query is sorted. 當您使用方法之後方法，其功能類似[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)陳述式的[ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md)子句。When you use the method after the method, it functions like the [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) statement of an [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) clause. ## Examples 這些範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 這個範例會建立新的 ，其中包含現有查詢的前兩個結果。This example creates a new that contains the first two results of the existing query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Top](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_top)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Top](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_top)] 這個範例會取得五個`Product`物件，在跳過在查詢結果中，依排序的前三個後`Product.ListPrice`。This example gets five `Product` objects after skipping the first three in the query result, sorted by `Product.ListPrice`. 而非[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)分頁。 is used instead of [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) for paging. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_SkipLimit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#projection_skiplimit)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_SkipLimit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#projection_skiplimit)]

returns.span: 新的 執行個體，它就相當於套用了 [UNION](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) 以便新增指定之 之結果的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [UNION](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) applied to add the results of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將所提供結果`query`沒有任何重複項目。 adds the results of the supplied `query` without any duplicates. 提供`query`，定義要加入必須的結果是相同的型別或可提升為這個型別之型別的。The supplied `query` that defines the results to add must be of the same type or of a type that can be promoted to the type of this . 例如，下列為有效因為`DiscontinuedProducts`可提升為`Products`:For example, the following is valid because `DiscontinuedProducts` can be promoted to `Products`: ``` ObjectQuery.Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 下列會擲回例外狀況，因為`Products`不可提升為`DiscontinuedProducts`。The following will throw an exception because `Products` cannot be promoted to `DiscontinuedProducts`. ``` ObjectQuery .Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 如型別的，這兩個查詢中的記錄必須有相同數目的資料行和類型的資料行中傳遞`query`必須可提升為中的資料行類型的.For an of type , the records in both queries must have the same number of columns, and the types in the columns of the of the passed `query` must be promotable to the types of the columns in the of the . 定義的參數提供的`query`會與參數中所定義的合併執行個體。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 參數在結合的 中必須是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 結合的集合中不能有兩個參數同名。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 結果查詢會從在上面呼叫 的 執行個體繼承連接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which was called. ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會使用 方法來建立新的 物件。The example uses method to creates a new object. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_Union](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_distinct_union)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_Union](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_distinct_union)]

Public Function UnionAll (query As ObjectQuery(Of T)) As ObjectQuery(Of T)
public: System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery<T> ^ UnionAll(System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery<T> ^ query);

param.name: query
param.span: ，它代表要加入的結果。

span.span: An that represents the results to add.

summary.span: 結合此查詢的結果與另一個物件查詢的結果，而且包括所有重複項目。

span.span: Combines the results of the query with the results of another object query, including all duplicates.

returns.span: 新的 執行個體，它就相當於套用了 [UNION ALL](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) 以便新增指定之 之結果的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [UNION ALL](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) applied to add the results of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將所提供結果`query`包括所有重複項目。 adds the results of the supplied `query` including all duplicates. 提供`query`，定義要加入必須結果是相同的型別或可提升為這個型別之型別的。The supplied `query` that defines results to add must be of the same type or of a type that can be promoted to the type of this . 例如，下列為有效因為`DiscontinuedProducts`可提升為`Products`:For example, the following is valid because `DiscontinuedProducts` can be promoted to `Products`: ``` ObjectQuery.Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 下列會擲回例外狀況，因為`Products`不可提升為`DiscontinuedProducts`。The following will throw an exception because `Products` cannot be promoted to `DiscontinuedProducts`. ``` ObjectQuery .Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 如型別的，這兩個查詢中的記錄必須有相同數目的資料行和類型的資料行中傳遞`query`必須可提升為中的資料行類型的.For an of type , the records in both queries must have the same number of columns, and the types in the columns of the of the passed `query` must be promotable to the types of the columns in the of the . 定義的參數提供的`query`會與參數中所定義的合併執行個體。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 參數在結合的 中必須是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 結合的集合中不能有兩個參數同名。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 結果查詢會從在上面呼叫 的 執行個體繼承連接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which was called. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會使用 方法來建立新的 物件。The example uses the method to create a new object. 然後，它會針對新的 物件呼叫 方法，以便取得這個查詢的唯一結果。Then it calls the method on the new object to get the unique results of this query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_distinct_unionall)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_distinct_unionall)]

summary.span: 將查詢限制為符合指定之篩選準則的結果。

span.span: Limits the query to results that match specified filtering criteria.

returns.span: 新的 執行個體，它就相當於套用了 [WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md) 的原始執行個體。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md) applied.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會建立新的 ，其中包含依據下列準則篩選現有查詢的結果：`"it.ProductID = 900"`。The example creates a new that contains results of the existing query filtered by the following criteria: `"it.ProductID = 900"`. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Where](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_where)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Where](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_where)]
